meanings.meaning_en_US: The capacity to accept or tolerate delay, trouble, or suffering without getting angry or upset.

examples.sentence: Her [patience] was tested during the long wait.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在漫長的等待中，她的耐心受到了考驗。

examples.sentence: He approached the problem with [patience] and care.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他以耐心和小心的態度處理這個問題。

examples.sentence: Developing [patience] is important for success.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 培養耐心對成功來說很重要。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Able to think clearly and quicky; attentive.

examples.sentence: You must stay [alert] while driving.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 開車時你必須保持警覺。

examples.sentence: He was [alert] to any signs of trouble.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他對任何問題的跡象都很警覺。

examples.sentence: She remained [alert] throughout the meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在會議中保持警覺。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Being fair and sensible; based on sound judgment.

examples.sentence: It is [reasonable] to expect a reply within a week.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 期待一週內回覆是合理的

examples.sentence: She has a [reasonable] amount of experience for the job.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她擁有該工作的合理經驗

examples.sentence: The price seems [reasonable] for the quality offered.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個價格對於提供的品質來說似乎很合理

meanings.meaning_en_US: Able to be seen; perceptible with the eye.

examples.sentence: The stars are visible in the night sky.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 夜空中的星星是可見的。

examples.sentence: Make sure the signs are [visible] to drivers.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 確保標誌對駕駛者是可見的。

examples.sentence: His progress was clearly [visible] to everyone.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的進步對每個人都非常明顯。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Ready, eager, or prepared to do something.

examples.sentence: She was [willing] to help him with his project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她樂意幫助他完成項目。

examples.sentence: Are you [willing] to make changes?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你願意做出改變嗎？

examples.sentence: He is always [willing] to learn new things.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他總是樂於學習新事物。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An object that is forcibly propelled at a target, typically used as a weapon.

examples.sentence: The military launched a [missile] during the test.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 軍方在測試中發射了一枚導彈

examples.sentence: They designed a new [missile] defense system.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們設計了一個新的導彈防禦系統

examples.sentence: The [missile] struck its target precisely.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 導彈準確地擊中了目標

meanings.meaning_en_US: The end or finish of an event, process, or text.

examples.sentence: The [conclusion] of the report was very insightful.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 報告的結論非常有啟發性。

examples.sentence: After much discussion, they reached a [conclusion].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 經過多次討論，他們達成了結論。

examples.sentence: In the [conclusion], the author summarizes the main points.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在結論中，作者總結了要點。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A plane figure with three straight sides and three angles.

examples.sentence: She drew a large [triangle] on the board.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在白板上畫了一個大三角形

examples.sentence: The triangle has three equal sides.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個三角形有三條相等的邊

examples.sentence: He explained the properties of a [triangle].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他解釋了三角形的特性

meanings.meaning_en_US: High respect or esteem; a privilege.

examples.sentence: It was an [honor] to receive the award.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 獲得該獎項是一種榮譽。

examples.sentence: He served with great [honor] in the military.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在軍中服役時充滿榮譽。

examples.sentence: To [honor] her legacy, we established a scholarship.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 為了榮譽她的遺產，我們設立了獎學金。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To irritate or disturb someone.

examples.sentence: His constant tapping began to [annoy] me.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他不斷的敲擊開始惹惱我。

examples.sentence: It's easy to [annoy] your siblings.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 惹惱你的兄弟姐妹很容易。

examples.sentence: Please don't [annoy] the cat by pulling its tail.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請不要通過拉尾巴來惹惱貓。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To have the courage to do something; to challenge someone to do something.

examples.sentence: I [dare] you to jump into the pool!
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我敢你跳進游泳池！

examples.sentence: She did not [dare] to speak up during the meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在會議中不敢發言

examples.sentence: Do you [dare] to try the hottest pepper?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你敢嘗試最辣的辣椒嗎？

meanings.meaning_en_US: Items that are no longer useful or wanted; waste material.

examples.sentence: He threw the [trash] in the bin.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他把垃圾扔進垃圾桶。

examples.sentence: The street was covered in [trash] after the festival.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 節日後街道上滿是垃圾。

examples.sentence: Please take out the [trash] regularly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請定期把垃圾拿出去。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To discard or dispose of something.

examples.sentence: You should [trash] that old report.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你應該丟掉那份舊報告。

examples.sentence: He [trashed] his old clothes.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他丟掉了舊衣服。

examples.sentence: Don't forget to [trash] items you no longer need.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 不要忘記丟掉不再需要的物品。

meanings.meaning_en_US: At an indefinite future time.

examples.sentence: I hope to travel to Paris [someday].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我希望某天能去巴黎旅行

examples.sentence: He promises to call me back [someday].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他承諾某天會打電話回來

examples.sentence: Maybe [someday] I'll learn to paint.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 也許某天我會學會畫畫

meanings.meaning_en_US: A device for warming the air or liquid.

examples.sentence: The [heater] kept the room warm during winter.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在冬天，暖氣讓房間保持溫暖

examples.sentence: She turned on the [heater] to fight the chill.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她打開暖氣來抵抗寒冷

examples.sentence: Their [heater] broke down before the cold snap.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們的暖氣在寒潮來臨之前壞了

meanings.meaning_en_US: Relating to ordinary citizens and their concerns.

examples.sentence: Everyone has a right to express their [civil] liberty.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每個人都有權表達自己的公民自由。

examples.sentence: He works in a [civil] rights organization.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在一個公民權利組織工作。

examples.sentence: The [civil] dispute was taken to court.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這場公民爭端被提上法庭。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A ceremony in which two people are united in marriage.

examples.sentence: Their [wedding] was held in a beautiful garden.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們的婚禮在美麗的花園中舉行。

examples.sentence: She wore a stunning dress for the [wedding].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她穿著一件驚豔的婚紗。

examples.sentence: They invited many friends to their [wedding].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們邀請了許多朋友參加他們的婚禮。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To transfer data from a local computer to a remote system.

examples.sentence: Please [upload] your files to the server.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請將你的文件上傳到伺服器

examples.sentence: It will take a while to [upload] the video.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 上傳視頻需要一段時間

examples.sentence: You need to [upload] the document before submitting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你需要在提交前上傳文檔

meanings.meaning_en_US: Up to the time of.

examples.sentence: We will wait [till] she arrives.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們會等直到她到達。

examples.sentence: You can stay [till] the end of the show.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以待到節目結束。

examples.sentence: I won't leave [till] I finish my work.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我不會離開直到我完成工作。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The part of a shirt or coat that encircles the neck.

examples.sentence: He adjusted the [collar] of his shirt.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他調整了襯衫的衣領。

examples.sentence: Her dress has a lace [collar].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的裙子有一個蕾絲衣領。

examples.sentence: The dog wears a [collar] with a name tag.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 那隻狗帶著一條帶名牌的項圈。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A person who studies or has studied a particular field or subject.

examples.sentence: As a [scholar], he published many research papers.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 作為一名學者，他發表了許多研究論文。

examples.sentence: The [scholar] gave a lecture on ancient history.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這位學者就古代歷史做了演講。

examples.sentence: She was awarded a grant for her work as a [scholar].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 因為她作為學者的工作，她獲得了資助。
